A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of fans are angry at this movie\, and with good reason\, I think.  It makes some choices that go against preconceived notions of what a Star Wars movie should be\, and for that I give Mr. Rian Johnson a huge salute for having to guts to do that.  Of course\, making surprising choices isn't enough.  It just so happened that these choices are in perfect service to the story and the messages.\n\nOh\, and it looks great.  So many shots in the third act were just breathtaking.
